column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Male reporter # 1 says : " Mr President , are you concerned that your approval ratings are now nearly as low as the Avatar 's ?
#Text=Raiko says : " I 'm not concerned with snappy put - downs in the press .
#Text=" Male reporter # 2 says : " Avatar Korra , do you regret the way you handled the Unalaq Crisis ?
#Text=" Female reporter # 1 says : " Why are you forcing the integration of spirits in Republic City ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Listen , I 've been trying everything I can think of to get rid of these vines , but - " Male reporter # 3 says : " Why ca n't you fix this ?
#Text=" Male reporter # 4 says : " Are the vines here to stay ?
#Text=" Female reporter # 2 says : " Is this part of your New World Order ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Look , Harmonic Convergence was just a couple weeks ago .
#Text=I just needed a little more time to get everything back to normal .
#Text=" Raiko says : " The Avatar has put us all in a very difficult position , but my administration - " Korra says : " Oh , I 'm sorry .
#Text=Did I put you in a difficult position by fighting the giant force of pure evil that was going to destroy the whole world ?
#Text=Maybe your administration could have handled that .
#Text=" Lin says : " That 's all , no more questions .
#Text=" Korra says : " This is a disaster .
#Text=" Asami says : " Do n't worry , we 'll figure something out .
#Text=" Korra says : " Easy for you to say .
#Text=You do n't have my poll numbers .
#Text=Eight percent approval ?
#Text=Who are they asking ?
#Text=" Asami says : " You ca n't take that to heart .
#Text=People are just frustrated .
#Text=" Korra says : " I do n't blame them .
#Text=I should be able to fix this .
#Text=I 'm the Avatar .
#Text="
